parameters.name: IdentityType
parameters.description:
Principal Type. Valid values:**user**or**custom role**.

Valid values:

*   USER
*   ROLE

parameters.name: RoleId
parameters.description:
The ID of the role.

> If IdentityType is set to ROLE, this parameter is required.

parameters.name: Tid
parameters.description:
The ID of the tenant.

> To view the ID of the tenant, go to the Data Management (DMS) console and move the pointer over the profile picture in the upper-right corner. For more information, see the [View information about the current tenant](~~181330~~) section of the "Manage DMS tenants" topic.

parameters.name: UserId
parameters.description:
The ID of the user. You can call the [GetUser](~~465816~~) operation to query the user ID.

> If IdentityType is set to USER, this parameter is required.
